requirement: "C-2-6] MUST honor the [android.intent.action.SENDTO](https://developer.android.com/reference/android/content/Intent#ACTION_SENDTO) and [android.intent.action.VIEW](https://developer.android.com/reference/android/content/Intent#ACTION_VIEW) intents and provide an activity to send/display SMS messages. "
Comment(internal) e.g. why a test is not: Though the intent is tested. The requirement says and app should be launched so user should see the SMS message and be able to send an SMS this is not tested. This could be manually tested.

requirement: "C-7-1] MUST provide a user-accessible mechanism to add and configure third-party input methods in response to the [`android.settings.INPUT_METHOD_SETTINGS`](https://developer.android.com/reference/android/provider/Settings#ACTION_INPUT_METHOD_SETTINGS) intent.  If device implementations support third-party accessibility services, they:  "
Comment(internal) e.g. why a test is not: Though the intent is tested. The requirement says the user can change to a third party input device. This could be manually tested, but a true end to end test would require a hardware HID.
